def final_candle_states(initial_states):
    states = list(initial_states)
    parity = 1
    for i in reversed(range(len(states))):
        parity ^= initial_states[i]
        states[i] ^= parity
    return states

def final_candle_states(initial_states):
    states = list(initial_states)
    parity = -1
    for i in reversed(range(len(states))):
        parity ^= initial_states[i]
        states[i] ^= parity
    return states

def final_candle_states(initial_states):
    states = list(initial_states)
    parity = 1
    for i in reversed(range(len(states))):
        parity ^= initial_states[i]
        states[i] ^= parity
    return states
